assignment4

Class Critter

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment4.Critter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Algae, Craig, Critter1, Critter2, Critter3, Critter4, MyCritter1, MyCritter5, MyCritter6, MyCritter7

    public abstract class Critter
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that all objects in the Critter world extend. Also manages the Critter world.

      • reproduce

        protected final void reproduce(Critter offspring,
                               int direction)
        Takes a new instance of Critter and adds it to the list of babies if possible. If the parent has enough energy, the offspring is assigned some of its energy and a location.
        Parameters:
        offspring - The new instance of Critter to be added
        direction - The direction in which this offspring will be placed

      • doTimeStep

        public abstract void doTimeStep()

      • fight

        public abstract boolean fight(java.lang.String opponent)

      • makeCritter

        public static void makeCritter(java.lang.String critter_class_name)
                        throws InvalidCritterException
        create and initialize a Critter subclass. critter_class_name must be the unqualified name of a concrete subclass of Critter, if not, an InvalidCritterException must be thrown. (Java weirdness: Exception throwing does not work properly if the parameter has lower-case instead of upper. For example, if craig is supplied instead of Craig, an error is thrown instead of an Exception.)
        Parameters:
        critter_class_name -
        Throws:
        InvalidCritterException

      • getInstances

        public static java.util.List<Critter> getInstances(java.lang.String critter_class_name)
                                            throws InvalidCritterException
        Gets a list of critters of a specific type.
        Parameters:
        critter_class_name - What kind of Critter is to be listed. Unqualified class name.
        Returns:
        List of Critters.
        Throws:
        InvalidCritterException

      • runStats

        public static void runStats(java.util.List<Critter> critters)
        Prints out how many Critters of each type there are on the board.
        Parameters:
        critters - List of Critters.
